lom:description.lom:string: This paper reviews past literature to understand why there are so few women in IT fields. Next, the paper introduces the SWIFT program , which is a program aiming to understand and challenge the low numbers of women in the IT field. The paper ends with a discussion of the SWIFT project, and plans for its future. Keywords:gender equity, women and information technology

lom:title.lom:string: Gender Issues in Computer Science Education
